name: Master Shapeshifter
description:
Your Feral, Balance or Restoration Affinity is amplified granting an additional effect.

 Restoration Affinity
After you Swiftmend, the cast time of your Regrowth is reduced by 30% and its healing is increased by 30% for 8 sec.

 Balance Affinity
After you enter Moonkin Form, the cast time of your Wrath and Starfire is reduced by 30% and their damage is increased by 20% for 10 sec.

 Feral Affinity
While in Cat Form, your bleed damage is increased by 30%.
